ygData.subject: Defending the Ark
ygData.msgSnippet: Ramhorn: Ramhorn got up, sub-machine gun raised in his right hand, his laser pistol in his left. Well, time to defend the Ark, once AGAIN.  Maybe I can die

Ramhorn:



Ramhorn got up, sub-machine gun raised in his right hand, his laser pistol in 
his left.
"Well, time to defend the Ark, once AGAIN.  Maybe I can die this time...no 
shame in dying while fighting for time."

Ramhorn through the corridors of the Ark, heading for the nearest access 
hatch closest to the would-be attackers.
